info.title: Places API
info.description: This is the full documentation for the Places API.

get.summary: Returns the alternate names of a specific continent
get.description: Display the alternate names of a continent in different languages.

get.summary: Returns a list of paginated continents
get.description: Display a listing of all continents.

get.summary: Display a specified continent.
Returns a list of paginated countries in a specific continent
get.description: Display a listing of all countries available in a specified continent.

get.summary: Returns the geometry of a specific continent
get.description: Display the Geometry of a specific Continent.

get.summary: Returns the alternate names of a specific country
get.description: Display the alternate names of a country.

get.summary: Returns a list of paginated countries
get.description: Display a listing of all countries.

get.summary: Display a specified country.
Returns the currency of a specific country
get.description: Display the currency of a country.

get.summary: Returns the flag of a specific country
get.description: Display the flag of a country.

get.summary: Returns the geometry of a specific country
get.description: Display the Geometry of a Country.

get.summary: Returns the languages of a specific country
get.description: Display the languages of a country.

get.summary: Returns the neighbouring countries of a specific country
get.description: Display the neighbouring countries of a country.

get.summary: Returns the places available in a specific country
get.description: Display the places available in a country.

get.summary: Returns the Time Zones available in a specific country
get.description: Display the Time Zones available in a country.

get.summary: Returns a list of paginated currencies
get.description: Display a listing of all currencies.

get.summary: Display a specified currency.
Returns a list of paginated feature classes
get.description: Display a listing of all feature classes.

get.summary: Display a specified feature class.
Returns a list of paginated feature codes
get.description: Display a listing of all feature codes.

get.summary: Display a specified feature code.
Returns a list of paginated flags
get.description: Display a listing of all flags.

get.summary: Display a specified flag.
Returns a list of paginated languages
get.description: Display a listing of all languages.

get.summary: Display a specified language.
Display the alternate names of a place.
Returns a list of paginated places
get.description: Display a listing of all places.

get.summary: Display a specified place.
Display a location of a specific place.
Returns a collection of statistics
get.description: Display a listing of all time zones.

get.summary: Returns a list of paginated time zones
get.description: Display a listing of all time zones.

get.summary: Display a specified time zone.

data.description: The paginated data set that is returned.

links.description: Display the links to other pages of the response

prev.description: The previous page of the paginated data set.

next.description: The next page in the paginated data set.

meta.description: Meta data related to paginated responses

path.description: The base path of the data that is being paginated.

perPage.description: The number of items per page.

nextCursor.description: The cursor to the next paginated set of data

prevCursor.description: The cursor to the previous paginated set of data

isPreferredName.description: Determines if the alternate name is official/preferred.

isShortName.description: Determines if the alternate name is a short name.

isHistoric.description: Determines if the alternate name is historic and was used in the past.

isColloquial.description: Determines if the alternate name is a colloquial or slang term.

name.description: The English name of the country

iso3166Alpha2.description: The two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

iso3166Alpha3.description: The three-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code

iso3166Numeric.description: The three-digit ISO 3166-1 numeric country code

area.description: The total area of the country

code.description: The code of the feature class

description.description: The description of the feature class

code.description: The code of the feature code

fullDescription.description: The full description of the feature code

shortDescription.description: The short description of the feature code

countryCode.description: The two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code that this flag belongs to

url.description: The location of the flag image

filename.description: The location of the flag image

type.description: The type of the GeoJSON object.

coordinates.description: Coordinates represent points, curves, and surfaces in coordinate space.

type.description: The type of the GeoJSON object.
The type of the GeoJSON object.

name.description: The name of a specific language

iso639.1.description: Two-letter language codes, one per language for ISO 639 macrolanguage

iso639.2.description: Three-letter language codes but with some codes derived from English names rather than native names of languages

iso639.3.description: Three-letter language codes but with distinct codes for each variety of an ISO 639 macrolanguage

latitude.description: The latitude of a certain place

longitude.description: The longitude of a certain place

geonameId.description: The Geoname ID of a certain place

asciiName.description: The ASCII name of a place

population.description: The population of a certain place

elevation.description: The elevation of a place in meters

dem.description: The digital elevation model of a place in meters

gmtOffset.description: The number of hours a place refers to that time zone being three hours
